name: Officer Park
descriptions: Officer Park is a Vault 101 security officer in Fallout 3. Together with Officer Wolfe, he is the last obstacle between the Lone Wanderer and the Capital Wasteland.

Posted by Overseer Almodovar to the Vault blast door to ensure that the Lone Wanderer does not open the door again and flee into the wasteland in pursuit of their father, Park is confident about his ability to stop a jumped-up young adult from opening the door and contaminating his Vault.

topics.response_text: Just keep your hands where I can see them.Play soundFO3_JohnKendall_KeepYourHands.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_JohnKendall_KeepYourHands.oggnoicon
